channel.description: Recent content in Geography on madd0's tech blog

item.title: How many countries can you name in 10 minutes?
item.description: I got to 81 while teaching (yes, I know I shouldn’t play in class…) I might have guessed more if I had been doing only that and if it were more flexible with spelling (”The Bahamas” is not the same as “Bahamas” for example). How many can you do?
